channel.title: Perfect server?
channel.description:
ok so i am making a server that will be guarenteed a great server...
but this time its up to u!
post here and tell us what u would love in a serer of ur choice but make them good ppl!!!!!
!!!!!!!

item.title: Perfect server?
item.dc:creator: @gunztheduel gunztheduel
item.description:
@gunztheduel wrote:

[size=15pt]My suggestions EXPLAINED:[/size]

Hamachi Server - It does not lag. Lots of people cannot log onto no-ip servers for some strange reason. Easy to set up.

New starting point - It is more fun having a different starting point e.g. Edgeville, for a change as it is boring always starting in Varrock.

Special Attack - Makes the server more cooler. There are tutorials, but they are not 100% completed yet.

Non-massing server - It is unfair to people because they do not click fast, AND they do not have time to eat food.

Final Statement:

Pretty much, search for lots of tutorials to edit your server, otherwise it’s just a counterfeit of another server. There are various glitches that you can try to fix.

Read full topic

item.title: Perfect server?
item.dc:creator: @cccrrraaazzziii cccrrraaazzziii
item.description:
@cccrrraaazzziii wrote:

To have the perfect server, I’d first make your own, and take player’s suggestions. So then, when you make updates, you don’t have to keep changing .

item.title: Perfect server?

item.description:
@Nintendo1 wrote:

Lots Of Codeing Is What You Need Stick To The Tut Section and add stuff to your server … i once got 101 people playing my server just because i did codeing !

item.title: Perfect server?
item.dc:creator: @Zzz_O_zzZ Zzz O zzZ
item.description:
@Zzz_O_zzZ wrote:

Best Ways To Get Your Server #1 Are…

  1. No-Ip (So No Ham)
  2. No Lagg At All
  3. 24 / 7 Server
  4. Organzied, Not Cluttered
  5. Make Lvling Fair But Not To Easy
  6. Have Certain Pking Areas

I’ll Think Of Some More Later, They Just Come To Me First.
